{{title|operator{{==}}{{dsc small|(std::text_encoding)}}}}
{{cpp/text/text_encoding/navbar}}
{{dcl begin}}
{{dcl|since=c++26|num=1|1=
friend constexpr bool operator==( const text_encoding&amp; a, 
                                  const text_encoding&amp; b ) noexcept;
}}
{{dcl|since=c++26|num=2|1=
friend constexpr bool operator==( const text_encoding&amp; a, id i ) noexcept;
}}
{{dcl end}}

Performs comparison operations on {{tt|text_encoding}} objects.

@1@ Compares two {{tt|text_encoding}} objects. The objects compare equal if and only if {{box|{{rlpi|comp-name}}{{nbsp|1}}{{c/core|(a.name(), b.name())}}}} is {{c|true}} when both {{c|a.mib()}} and {{c|b.mib()}} are equal to {{c|id::other}}, or {{c|a.mib()}} is equal to {{c|b.mib()}}.

@2@ Compare {{tt|text_encoding}} object with a MIBenum value. The objects compare equal if and only if {{c|a.mib()}} is equal to {{c|i}}.

{{cpp/hidden friend|{{tt|std::text_encoding}}|plural=yes}}

{{cpp/note synthesized eq}}

===Parameters===
{{par begin}}
{{par|a, b|{{tt|text_encoding}} objects to compare}}
{{par|i|{{tt|id}} value to compare with the MIBenum value contained in {{c|a}}}}
{{par end}}

===Return value===
@1@ {{box|{{c/core|1=a.mib() == id::other &amp;&amp; b.mib() == id::other}}&lt;br&gt;{{nbspt|4}}{{c/core|?}}{{nbspt|1}}{{tti|comp-name}}{{nbsp|1}}{{c/core|1=(a.name(), b.name())}}&lt;br&gt;{{nbspt|4}}{{c/core|1=: a.mib() == b.mib()}}}}.
@2@ {{c|1=a.mib() == i}}.
